item.title: Iota thật là vi diệu
item.author: hi@imlinh.com (Tan Linh)
item.description: Theo Go Wiki Go’s iota identifier is used in const declarations to simplify definitions of incrementing numbers. Because it can be used in expressions, it provides a generality beyond that of simple enumerations.
